greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Average of row n of A082259.
program: (PARI) a(n) = my(s=0, k=1); for (i=1, n, while (sumdigits(k*n) != n, k++); s += k*n; k++;); s/n; \\ _Michel Marcus_, Mar 26 2020
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Apr 12 2003
ext: Corrected and extended by _Ray Chandler_, Oct 08 2005
